title: An unprecedented year in immigration, and in anti-immigration rhetoric
description: 2023 saw a record number of migrants at the US-Mexico border. The issue is front and center in the Republican presidential campaigns.

title: A 27-year-old woman who called 911 for help was fatally shot by an LA deputy
description: A Los Angeles deputy shot Niani Finlayson who police said had been threatening her boyfriend for allegedly harming her daughter. A lawyer for her family says Finlayson was a domestic violence victim.

title: Biden expands pardons for marijuana possession and grants clemency to 11
description: President Biden commuted the sentences for 11 individuals serving time for nonviolent drug offenses. He also expanded pardons for the offense of simple marijuana possession and use under federal law.

title: News quiz resolutions: What should our favorite newsmakers aim to do in 2024?
description: Human, animal and artificially intelligent celebrities have New Year's resolutions, too. If you know (or can guess) what those resolutions could be, you might close out the year with an 11/11.
